title: HAX Principles
description: Designing transparent, predictable AI experiences following Microsoft HAX guidelines

principles.title: Make Clear What the System Can Do
principles.description: Users should understand the AI's capabilities and limitations upfront, setting appropriate expectations.

principles.title: Make Clear How Well the System Can Do What It Can Do
principles.description: Provide confidence indicators and accuracy information so users can make informed decisions.

principles.title: Time Services Based on Context
principles.description: Deliver AI assistance at the right moment, when it's most useful and least disruptive.

principles.title: Show Contextually Relevant Information
principles.description: Present information that matters to the user's current task and context.

principles.title: Match Relevant Social Norms
principles.description: Design AI interactions that feel natural and appropriate within cultural and social contexts.

principles.title: Mitigate Social Biases
principles.description: Ensure AI systems are fair, inclusive, and free from harmful biases.

principles.title: Support Efficient Invocation
principles.description: Make it easy for users to access AI features when needed, with clear entry points.

principles.title: Support Efficient Dismissal
principles.description: Allow users to easily ignore or dismiss AI suggestions without friction.

principles.title: Support Efficient Correction
principles.description: Enable users to fix AI mistakes quickly and easily, with clear correction paths.

principles.title: Scope Services When in Doubt
principles.description: Limit AI actions when uncertainty exists, prioritizing user safety and control.

principles.title: Make Clear Why the System Did What It Did
principles.description: Provide explanations for AI decisions, helping users understand the reasoning behind actions.

principles.title: Remember Recent Interactions
principles.description: Maintain context across user sessions, remembering relevant past interactions.

principles.title: Learn from User Behavior
principles.description: Adapt to user preferences over time, improving personalization while respecting privacy.

principles.title: Update and Adapt Cautiously
principles.description: Make changes that improve rather than disrupt user workflows, with careful testing.

principles.title: Encourage Granular Feedback
principles.description: Enable users to provide specific feedback on AI performance, improving the system iteratively.

principles.title: Convey the Consequences of User Actions
principles.description: Help users understand how their actions affect the AI system and outcomes.

principles.title: Provide Global Controls
principles.description: Give users control over AI behavior and settings at a system-wide level.

principles.title: Notify Users About Changes
principles.description: Keep users informed about system updates and changes that affect their experience.
